wikipedia_page.main: Caroline Emily Gray Hill (14 August 1843 – 1924) was a British artist and photographer.

response: Hill married in 1864 Caroline Emily Hardy (1843–1924), daughter of George Drake Hardy of Tottenham. A painter known as Caroline Emily Gray Hill, or Lady Gray Hill, she had works—landscapes of Palestine—shown in a solo retrospective exhibition "The Lady and the Desert" at Ticho House in 2002.
